org.apache.ignite.ml.optimization

Class GradientDescent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.optimization.GradientDescent

  • public class GradientDescent
extends Object
    Gradient descent optimizer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GradientDescent(GradientFunction lossGradient, Updater updater)
      New gradient descent instance based of loss function and updater.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GradientDescent

        public GradientDescent(GradientFunction lossGradient,
                       Updater updater)
        New gradient descent instance based of loss function and updater.
        Parameters:
        lossGradient - Function which computes gradient of the loss function at any given point
        updater - Weights updater applied on every gradient descent step to decide how weights should be changed

    • Method Detail

      • withMaxIterations

        public GradientDescent withMaxIterations(int maxIterations)
        Sets max number of gradient descent iterations.
        Parameters:
        maxIterations - Max number of gradient descent iterations
        Returns:
        This gradient descent instance

      • withConvergenceTol

        public GradientDescent withConvergenceTol(double convergenceTol)
        Sets convergence tolerance.
        Parameters:
        convergenceTol - Condition which decides iteration termination
        Returns:
        This gradient descent instance

      • optimize

        public Vector optimize(Matrix data,
                       Vector initWeights)
        Computes point where loss function takes minimal value.
        Parameters:
        data - Inputs parameters of loss function
        initWeights - Initial weights
        Returns:
        Point where loss function takes minimal value
